name: Tiny Baked Mac & Cheese
description: A dish that’s both perfect for entertaining and fun for kids!
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot set over high heat, boil pasta until tender, about 6–8 min. Drain and return to pot.

Stir in milk, seasoning, and butter, if using. Stir to coat. Spoon into six ramekins. Top with cheese, then sprinkle with coating mix. Place on Sheet Pan and bake 5 min until cheese has melted and top is golden.
tips: For a smoky twist, season Mac & Cheese with Smoked Spanish Paprika.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups mixed greens, 1 tbsp favourite Epicure Dressing, and 1⁄2 cup cooked chicken, tofu, or fish.
